data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 20044, Version Hash: aa617d3b075ba073c0837aa028c08ab88e286208
data.actual_result: Discord goes to the last page, with no messages shown and the counter going "out of bounds" (for example, `Page 5 / 4`)
data.expected_result: Discord should stay on the same page and update the counter / page to adapt to the missing messages
data.short_description: The search menu goes out of bounds if you delete messages that were found.
data.steps_to_repro: - Search a word that has more than a page - Go to the pre-last page (the page before the last one) - Start deleting messages that match the page, till you delete a page's worth (just go through all hit messages in the page) - Go to the next page
